ai.summary: Leaves Green Circular Walk is a 27 km hard circular hike in the UK. The route traverses a mix of countryside and woodland with some steep sections and long exposed stretches. It’s best suited to experienced hikers with good stamina who are prepared for variable conditions and a full day of walking.
ai.terrain_summary: The terrain combines grassy paths, wooded tracks, and sections of uneven ground. Expect mud after rain, occasional rocky or root-strewn parts, and some open, exposed sections where weather can affect footing and visibility. Navigation may be required in rural lanes or poorly marked stretches.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for 6–9 hours of hiking. Check the forecast and daylight hours. Carry a map and compass or a reliable GPS device, and tell someone your planned route and estimated return. Wear sturdy, ankle-supporting footwear and bring adequate water (2–3 L) and high-energy snacks. Pack weather-appropriate clothing (layers plus waterproofs), a first aid kit, a headlamp or flashlight, sun protection, a whistle, and, if possible, an emergency bivy or space blanket. Be mindful of livestock and farm access restrictions and know your escape options if weather deteriorates.
recommended_gear: Water bottle or hydration system (2–3 L)
Map and compass or GPS device
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October) for milder weather and longer daylight; winter hikes are possible with extra gear and careful planning.

seo.title: Leaves Green Circular Walk - 27 km Hard Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Leaves Green Circular Walk, a demanding 27 km circuit in the UK. Enjoy woodland, open countryside and a true test for experienced hikers.
seo.h1: Leaves Green Circular Walk - 27 km, Hard Difficulty (UK)
